fields.name: change_type
fields.title: Change_Type
fields.description:
An indicator showing if the payment record is New, Added, Changed, or Unchanged in the current publication compared to the previous publication.
·     NEW - To identify “new” records added from the end of the previous submission deadline until the current submission period deadline date
·     ADDED - To identify records that were not eligible at the time of previous publication, which is eligible for current publication.
·     CHANGED - To identify previously published records modified after the last publication.
·     UNCHANGED - To identify previously published records that remain “unchanged” in current publication.

fields.name: covered_recipient_type
fields.title: Covered_Recipient_Type
fields.description: An indicator showing if the recipient of the payment or other transfer of value is a physician covered recipient, or non-physician practitioner, teaching hospital covered recipient, non-covered recipient entity, or non-covered recipient individual

fields.name: noncovered_recipient_entity_name
fields.title: Noncovered_Recipient_Entity_Name
fields.description: The name of the non-covered recipient entity receiving the payment or other transfer of value

fields.name: teaching_hospital_ccn
fields.title: Teaching_Hospital_CCN
fields.description: A unique identifying number (CMS Certification Number) of the Teaching Hospital receiving the payment or other transfer of value.

fields.name: teaching_hospital_id
fields.title: Teaching_Hospital_ID
fields.description: System generated unique identifier of the Teaching Hospital receiving the payment or other transfer of value.

fields.name: teaching_hospital_name
fields.title: Teaching_Hospital_Name
fields.description: The name of the Teaching Hospital receiving the payment or other transfer of value. The name displayed is as listed in CMS teaching hospital list under Hospital name.

fields.name: covered_recipient_profile_id
fields.title: Covered_Recipient_Profile_ID
fields.description: System generated unique identifier for covered recipient physician profile or covered recipient non-physician practitioner profile receiving the payment or other transfer of value.

fields.name: covered_recipient_npi
fields.title: Covered_Recipient_NPI
fields.description: National Provider Identifier is a unique identification number for covered recipient physician or non-physician practitioner (and not the NPI of a group the physician/non- physician practitioner belongs to).

fields.name: covered_recipient_first_name
fields.title: Covered_Recipient_First_Name
fields.description: First name of the physician (covered recipient) or covered recipient non-physician practitioner receiving the payment or transfer of value, as reported by the submitting entity.

fields.name: covered_recipient_middle_name
fields.title: Covered_Recipient_Middle_Name
fields.description: Middle name of the covered recipient physician or covered recipient non-physician practitioner receiving the payment or transfer of value, as reported by the submitting entity.

fields.name: covered_recipient_last_name
fields.title: Covered_Recipient_Last_Name
fields.description: Last name of the covered recipient physician or covered recipient non-physician practitioner receiving the payment or transfer of value, as reported by the submitting entity.

fields.name: covered_recipient_name_suffix
fields.title: Covered_Recipient_Name_Suffix
fields.description: Name suffix of the covered recipient physician or covered recipient non-physician practitioner receiving the payment or transfer of value, as reported by the submitting entity.

fields.name: recipient_primary_business_street_address_line1
fields.title: Recipient_Primary_Business_Street_Address_Line1
fields.description: The first line of the primary business street address of the physician or non-physician practitioner or teaching hospital or non-covered recipient entity receiving the payment or other transfer of value

fields.name: recipient_primary_business_street_address_line2
fields.title: Recipient_Primary_Business_Street_Address_Line2
fields.description: The second line of the primary business street address of the physician or teaching hospital or non-covered recipient entity receiving the payment or other transfer of value

fields.name: recipient_city
fields.title: Recipient_City
fields.description: The primary practice/business address city of the physician or teaching hospital or non-covered recipient entity receiving the payment or other transfer of value

fields.name: recipient_state
fields.title: Recipient_State
fields.description: The state or territory abbreviation of the primary business address of the physician or teaching hospital or non-covered recipient entity receiving the payment or other transfer of value if the primary business address is in the United States.

fields.name: recipient_zip_code
fields.title: Recipient_Zip_Code
fields.description: The 9-digit zip code for the primary business location of the physician or teaching hospital or non-covered recipient entity receiving the payment or other transfer of value if the primary practice address is in the United States

fields.name: recipient_country
fields.title: Recipient_Country
fields.description: The primary practice/business address country of the physician or teaching hospital or non-covered recipient entity receiving the payment or other transfer of value if the primary practice address is in the United States

fields.name: recipient_province
fields.title: Recipient_Province
fields.description:
The primary practice/business province name of the physician or teaching hospital or non-covered recipient entity receiving the payment or other transfer of value, if the primary practice/business address is outside the United
States, and if applicable.

fields.name: recipient_postal_code
fields.title: Recipient_Postal_Code
fields.description:
The international postal code for the primary business location of the physician or teaching hospital or non- covered recipient entity receiving the payment or other transfer of value if the primary business address is outside
the United States

fields.title: Covered_Recipient_Primary_Type_1
fields.description: Primary type of medicine practiced by the physician or Non-Physician Practitioner (covered recipient).

fields.name: submitting_applicable_manufacturer_or_applicable_gpo_name
fields.title: Submitting_Applicable_Manufacturer_or_Applicable_GPO_Name
fields.description: Textual proper name of either the Submitting Applicable Manufacturer or Submitting Applicable Group Purchasing Organization (GPO).

fields.name: applicable_manufacturer_or_applicable_gpo_making_payment_id
fields.title: Applicable_Manufacturer_or_Applicable_GPO_Making_Payment_ID
fields.description: System generated unique identifier of the Applicable Manufacturer or Applicable Group Purchasing Organization (GPO) Making payment or other transfer of value

fields.name: applicable_manufacturer_or_applicable_gpo_making_payment_name
fields.title: Applicable_Manufacturer_or_Applicable_GPO_Making_Payment_Name
fields.description: Textual proper name of the applicable manufacturer or applicable GPO making the payment or other transfer of value

fields.name: applicable_manufacturer_or_applicable_gpo_making_payment_state
fields.title: Applicable_Manufacturer_or_Applicable_GPO_Making_Payment_State
fields.description: State name of the submitting applicable manufacturer or submitting applicable GPO as provided in Open  Payments

fields.name: applicable_manufacturer_or_applicable_gpo_making_payment_country
fields.title: Applicable_Manufacturer_or_Applicable_GPO_Making_Payment_Country
fields.description:
Country name of the Submitting Applicable Manufacturer or
Submitting Applicable Group Purchasing Organization (GPO) as provided in Open Payments

fields.name: related_product_indicator
fields.title: Related_Product_Indicator
fields.description: Indicator allows the applicable manufacturer or applicable GPO to select whether the payment or other transfer of value is related to one or more product(s) (drugs, devices, biologicals, or medical supplies). If the payment was not made in relation to a product, select "No". If the payment was related to one or more product, select "Yes".

fields.name: covered_or_noncovered_indicator_1
fields.title: Covered_or_Noncovered_Indicator_1
fields.description: For each product listed in relation to the payment or other transfer of value, indicates if the product is a covered or non-covered product per the covered product definition in the Open Payments final rule.

fields.name: indicate_drug_or_biological_or_device_or_medical_supply_1
fields.title: Indicate_Drug_or_Biological_or_Device_or_Medical_Supply_1
fields.description: For each product listed in relation to the payment or other transfer of value, indicates if the product is a drug, device, biological, or medical supply.

fields.name: product_category_or_therapeutic_area_1
fields.title: Product_Category_or_Therapeutic_Area_1
fields.description: Provide the product category or therapeutic area for the covered drug, device, biological, or medical supply listed in relation to the payment or other transfer of value.

fields.name: name_of_drug_or_biological_or_device_or_medical_supply_1
fields.title: Name_of_Drug_or_Biological_or_Device_or_Medical_Supply_1
fields.description: The marketed name of the drug, device, biological, or medical supply. May report the marketed name of up to five products (drugs, devices, biologicals, or medical supplies) associated with the payment or other transfer of value.

fields.name: associated_drug_or_biological_ndc_1
fields.title: Associated_Drug_or_Biological_NDC_1
fields.description: The National Drug Code, if any, of the drug or biological associated with the payment or other transfer of value (if applicable); the record may report up to 5 codes

fields.name: associated_device_or_medical_supply_pdi_1
fields.title: Associated_Device_or_Medical_Supply_PDI_1
fields.description:
The Primary Device Identifier, if any, of the covered device or covered medical supply associated with the payment or other transfer of values (if applicable); the record may report up to 5 codes.
Note: OP Program began collecting PDI information during PY 2021.

fields.name: covered_or_noncovered_indicator_2
fields.title: Covered_or_Noncovered_Indicator_2
fields.description: For each product listed in relation to the payment or other transfer of value, indicates if the product is a covered or non-covered product per the covered product definition in the Open Payments final rule.

fields.description: For each product listed in relation to the payment or other transfer of value, indicates if the product is a drug, device, biological, or medical supply.

fields.name: product_category_or_therapeutic_area_2
fields.title: Product_Category_or_Therapeutic_Area_2
fields.description: Provide the product category or therapeutic area for the covered drug, device, biological, or medical supply listed in relation to the payment or other transfer of value.

fields.description: The marketed name of the drug, device, biological, or medical supply. May report the marketed name of up to five products (drugs, devices, biologicals, or medical supplies) associated with the payment or other transfer of value.

fields.title: Associated_Drug_or_Biological_NDC_5
fields.description: The National Drug Code, if any, of the drug or biological associated with the payment or other transfer of value (if applicable); the record may report up to 5 codes

fields.name: associated_device_or_medical_supply_pdi_5
fields.title: Associated_Device_or_Medical_Supply_PDI_5
fields.description:
The Primary Device Identifier, if any, of the covered device or covered medical supply associated with the payment or other transfer of values (if applicable); the record may report up to 5 codes.
Note: OP Program began collecting PDI information during PY 2021.

fields.name: total_amount_of_payment_usdollars
fields.title: Total_Amount_of_Payment_USDollars
fields.description: U.S. dollar amount of payment or transfer of value to recipient (manufacturer must convert to dollar currency if necessary).

fields.name: date_of_payment
fields.title: Date_of_Payment
fields.description: If a singular payment, then this is the actual date the payment was issued; if a series of payments or an aggregated set of payments, this is the date of the first payment to the covered recipient in this program year

fields.name: form_of_payment_or_transfer_of_value
fields.title: Form_of_Payment_or_Transfer_of_Value
fields.description: The method of payment used to pay the covered recipient or to make the transfer of value.

fields.name: expenditure_category1
fields.title: Expenditure_Category1
fields.description: Contextual category for this research payment or other transfer of value

fields.name: expenditure_category2
fields.title: Expenditure_Category2
fields.description: Contextual category for this research payment or other transfer of value

fields.name: expenditure_category3
fields.title: Expenditure_Category3
fields.description: Contextual category for this research payment or other transfer of value

fields.name: expenditure_category4
fields.title: Expenditure_Category4
fields.description: Contextual category for this research payment or other transfer of value

fields.name: expenditure_category5
fields.title: Expenditure_Category5
fields.description: Contextual category for this research payment or other transfer of value

fields.name: expenditure_category6
fields.title: Expenditure_Category6
fields.description: Contextual category for this research payment or other transfer of value

fields.name: preclinical_research_indicator
fields.title: Preclinical_Research_Indicator
fields.description: An indicator showing if payment or other transfer of value is related to research, which is pre-clinical

fields.name: delay_in_publication_indicator
fields.title: Delay_in_Publication_Indicator
fields.description: An indicator showing if an applicable manufacturer or applicable GPO is requesting a delay in publication of a payment or other transfer of value when the payment or other transfer of value is made in connection with: (1) research on or development of a new product (drug, device, biological, or medical supply) or (2) clinical investigation regarding a new product (drug, device, biological, or medical supply)

fields.name: name_of_study
fields.title: Name_of_Study
fields.description: The textual name of the study for which the covered recipient is receiving this payment or other transfer of value. The textual name of the study for which the covered recipient is receiving this payment or other transfer of value

fields.name: dispute_status_for_publication
fields.title: Dispute_Status_for_Publication
fields.description: Indicates whether the payment or other transfer of value is disputed by the covered recipient or not

fields.name: record_id
fields.title: Record_ID
fields.description: System assigned identifier to the research transaction at the time of submission

fields.name: program_year
fields.title: Program_Year
fields.description: The year in which the payment occurred, as reported by submitting entity.

fields.name: payment_publication_date
fields.title: Payment_Publication_Date
fields.description: The predefined date when the payment or other transfer of value is scheduled to be published

fields.name: clinicaltrials_gov_identifier
fields.title: ClinicalTrials_Gov_Identifier
fields.description:
Identifier assigned if research study is registered on
clinicaltrials.gov

fields.name: research_information_link
fields.title: Research_Information_Link
fields.description: Optional link to information relevant to the research study for which this payment or other transfer of value is being reported (there can be a maximum of five links reported)

fields.name: context_of_research
fields.title: Context_of_Research
fields.description: Textual description of research context or research objectives
